title: What We All Must Remember.....
body:
https://static.comicvine.com/uploads/scale_super/13/132327/3245471-art_trade__samurai_jack_by_xjapanrox.jpg

Down vote terrorism is a crime. We shall rebel and keep these terrorists at bay. Join the movement to help prevent down vote terrorism.... Our GD history has suffered many wars on down vote terrorism....

The first great war:

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/AHmmoVGt-my-mission-is-far-from-over?comment=0000

we must not forget the past... lest it consume us all.
